type.description: Badge type, can be set to default primary info success warning danger
type.description_zh: 徽章类型，可设置为默认主信息成功警告危险

dot.description: Whether the badge is a dot

value.description: The value shown in the badge (takes effect when dot is false)
value.description_zh: 徽章中显示的值（当 dot 为 false 时生效）

max-value.description: The maximum value shown in the logo, when value is greater than max-value, displays max-value+ (effective when both value and max-value exist)
max-value.description_zh: 当 value 大于 max-value 时，徽标中显示的最大值将显示 max-value+（当 value 和 max-value 同时存在时有效）

position.description: Define the position of the logo on other labels when there are other labels in the logo tag. Optional values are right-top right-bottom left-top left-bottom
position.description_zh: 当徽标标签中有其他标签时，定义徽标在其他标签上的位置。可选值为右-上、右-下、左-上-左-下

icon.description: Customize the content of the icon in the badge (priority is higher than value)
icon.description_zh: 自定义徽章中图标的内容（优先级高于值）

namespace.description: Customize the namespace of the icon in the badge
namespace.description_zh: 自定义锁屏提醒中图标的命名空间

slots.name: value
slots.description: The value shown in the badge
